text: 6.14 Lom 2.29, 6.6, 1 Ko 1.31, 2.2, Plp 3.3, 3.7-8 Pen yad ke yɨb yad ak ma dad aplanɨgayn. Bɨawl chɨn Jisas Klays ayɨp agɨl mab bak alaŋ kumek, yad ayɨp kumnek tek lup ak agɨl, mɨñmɨñ gɨl yɨb nop nokom dad aplanɨgayn. Ne ayɨp kumnek anɨb ak, bɨ pɨsnep kumeb tek ak mɨden, tap lum awl yɨl ak yɨp gos ma gup. Binɨb lum awl yɨl okok yɨp pen nɨgel, tap yokɨp olap tek lek, bɨ pɨsnep kumeb tek ak mɨdebin.
